title: 1  Bubble plot for ranks
text:
library(Figures)
data(df_rank)
head(df_rank)

          Variable mean_rank   method  sig rank
1          Lactate  1.797143 Logistic TRUE    1
2              Age  3.777143 Logistic TRUE    2
3       Hematocrit  3.891429 Logistic TRUE    3
4              BUN  4.588571 Logistic TRUE    4
5        Anion gap  6.417143 Logistic TRUE    5
6 Respiration rate  6.588571 Logistic TRUE    6

bubble_for_rank(data = df_rank, y_name = "Variable", x_name = "method",
                rank_name = "mean_rank", highlight_name = "sig")



bubble_for_rank(data = df_rank,
                y_name = "Variable", x_name = "method", rank_name = "mean_rank",
                highlight_name = "sig",
                arrange_rows_by = "Linear XGBoost (AUC-based)")



bubble_for_rank(data = df_rank,
                y_name = "Variable", x_name = "method", rank_name = "mean_rank",
                highlight_name = "sig",
                arrange_rows_by = "Linear XGBoost (AUC-based)",
                x_order = c("Logistic", "Linear XGBoost (loss-based)",
                            "Linear XGBoost (AUC-based)", "Linear SVM"),
                vline_at = 1.5)

title: 2  Horizontal bar plot for variable importance
text:
data(df_compas_shapley_vic, package = "ShapleyVIC")
head(df_compas_shapley_vic)

  model_id                 var_names sage_value_unadjusted      sage_sd
1        1                       Age          0.0026693517 0.0003409647
2        1                      Race         -0.0015550084 0.0004302082
3        1    Prior criminal history          0.0148514285 0.0004843732
4        1                    Gender         -0.0022936187 0.0003539186
5        1 Juvenile criminal history          0.0171023134 0.0004201479
6        1            Current charge         -0.0009106555 0.0002120055
  shapley_vic_val perf_metric
1    0.0026693517    1.003292
2   -0.0015550084    1.003292
3    0.0148514285    1.003292
4   -0.0022936187    1.003292
5    0.0171023134    1.003292
6   -0.0009106555    1.003292

library(magrittr)
library(ggplot2)
df_bars <- df_compas_shapley_vic %$% ShapleyVIC::summarise_shapley_vic(
  val = shapley_vic_val, val_sd = sage_sd, var_names = var_names
)
df_bars %$% Figures::draw_bars(
  val = val, var_names = Variable, x_lab = "ShapleyVIC values"
) + theme(text = element_text(size = 14))
